name: DecoCake!
description:
This is Decorate a cake like... RIGHT NOW!! Better known as DecoCake.

This is a small little game where you'll... Decorate a cake. How many cakes can you decorate in 80 seconds?

It's a short arcadey game, if you enjoy it, tell me and I might update it in the future with harder mechanics. The feedback forum will remain in game too, if you want to fill it up.
